00020 #include <cassert>
00021 
00022 namespace boost {
00023 namespace xint {
00024 namespace detail {
00025 
00026 static size_t datasize=(sizeof(data_t<>)+sizeof(digit_t)-1) / sizeof(digit_t);
00027 
00028 data_t<> *allocate(size_t max_digits, size_t initial_length) {
00029     if (max_digits < 1) max_digits = 1;
00030     size_t count = max_digits - 1 + datasize;
00031 
00032     try {
00033         digit_t *storage(new digit_t[count]);
00034         data_t<> *r=reinterpret_cast<data_t<>*>(storage);
00035         r->copies=0;
00036         r->length=(std::min)(initial_length, max_digits);
00037         r->max_length=max_digits;
00038 
00039         digit_t *p = r->magnitude, *pe = p + r->length;
00040         while (p!=pe) *p++=0;
00041         return r;
00042     } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00043         throw exceptions::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating integer");
00044     }
00045 }
00046 
00047 data_t<> *reallocate(data_t<> *olddata, size_t newsize) {
00048     if (olddata==0) {
00049         data_t<> *newdata=allocate(newsize);
00050         newdata->copies=1;
00051         return newdata;
00052     } if (olddata->copies == 1 && newsize <= olddata->max_length) {
00053         // We can re-use this data.
00054         if (olddata->length < newsize) {
00055             digit_t *p=olddata->magnitude + olddata->length,
00056                 *pe=olddata->magnitude + newsize;
00057             while (p!=pe) *p++=0;
00058         } else {
00059             digit_t *p=olddata->magnitude + olddata->length,
00060                 *pe=olddata->magnitude + newsize;
00061             while (p!=pe) *(--p)=0;
00062         }
00063         olddata->length = newsize;
00064         return olddata;
00065     } else {
00066         // Have to allocate new data.
00067         data_t<> *newdata=allocate(newsize, 0);
00068         newdata->copies=1;
00069         newdata->length=newsize;
00070         digit_t *s=olddata->magnitude, *se=s+olddata->length,
00071             *t=newdata->magnitude, *te=t+newdata->length;
00072         while (s!=se) *t++ = *s++;
00073         while (t < te) *t++ = 0;
00074 
00075         if (--olddata->copies == 0) deallocate(olddata);
00076         return newdata;
00077     }
00078 }
00079 
00080 data_t<> *duplicate(data_t<> *olddata, size_t extra) {
00081     data_t<> *r = allocate(olddata->length+extra, 0);
00082     r->length = olddata->length;
00083     r->copies=1;
00084 
00085     digit_t *s = olddata->magnitude, *se = s + olddata->length,
00086         *t = r->magnitude, *te = t + olddata->length + extra;
00087     while (s!=se) *t++ = *s++;
00088     while (t < te) *t++ = 0;
00089 
00090     if (olddata && --olddata->copies == 0) deallocate(olddata);
00091     return r;
00092 }
00093 
00094 data_t<> *duplicate(data_t<> *olddata, data_t<> *data_to_copy, size_t extra) {
00095     if (!olddata || olddata->copies > 1 || data_to_copy->length + extra >
00096         olddata->max_length)
00097     {
00098         data_t<> *r = allocate(data_to_copy->length+extra, 0);
00099         r->length = data_to_copy->length + extra;
00100         digit_t *s = data_to_copy->magnitude, *se = s + data_to_copy->length,
00101             *t = r->magnitude, *te = t + r->length;
00102         while (s!=se) *t++ = *s++;
00103         while (t < te) *t++ = 0;
00104         r->copies=1;
00105         if (olddata && --olddata->copies == 0) deallocate(olddata);
00106         return r;
00107     } else {
00108         data_t<> *r = olddata;
00109         digit_t *s = data_to_copy->magnitude, *se = s + data_to_copy->length,
00110             *t = r->magnitude, *te = t + r->length + extra;
00111         while (s != se) *t++ = *s++;
00112         while (t < te) *t++ = 0;
00113         r->length = data_to_copy->length;
00114         return r;
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 void deallocate(data_t<> *data) {
00119     digit_t *digits=reinterpret_cast<digit_t*>(data);
00120 
00121     #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00122     digit_t *p = digits, *pe = p + data->max_length + datasize;
00123     while (p != pe) *p++ = 0;
00124     #endif
00125 
00126     delete[] digits;
00127 }
